name: Unstable Lapse
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 49.

It is a point and click game.

We struggled with time on this one so some feedback like animations and certain sounds are still missing on this build.

How To Play

You should swing around your click in order to find interactions (an interaction hint will popup on interactable objects).

Click interactable objects when you are close enough to them to start interaction.

Credits

Game Designers: Nabu, Nikovski
